CityBankSqlResource.SelectIncludeAll: SELECT CityBanks.Id,BankNo,CityBanks.State,CityBanks.Name,City_Id,Orgs.Name Name FROM dbo.CityBanks WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs WITH(NOLOCK) ON City_Id=[Orgs].Id
CityBankSqlResource.FirstOrDefaultIncludeAll: SELECT CityBanks.Id,BankNo,CityBanks.State,CityBanks.Name,City_Id,Orgs.Name Name FROM dbo.CityBanks WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs WITH(NOLOCK) ON City_Id=[Orgs].Id WHERE [CityBanks].Id=@Id
